Text:
(At the age of fifteen, aristocrats begin their three-
year education at the Midgar Academy for Dark
Knights in the capital.)

(My big sister Claire was supposed to begin her
studies there,)
(but on the day of her departure, she vanished...)
Aaaah... How could this happen?!
The culprit must have been highly skilled...
to do this without Claire noticing,
...even if she was asleep.
Are you saying we're out of luck...
...since the kidnapper was skilled?

Th-That's not what I'm saying. I was just stating
a fact...
Shut it, baldyyyyyy!!!
Eep! I-I'm sorry! I'm sorry!

(By the way, it's like I'm invisible. They don't
expect much from me, and I don't cause
any trouble. I'm trying to keep this up to
lie low in the background.)

(After feigning concerned as my parents bicker,
I sneak into my room and roll into bed.)
Beta.
Yes, Master Shadow.

(She's an elf girl like Alpha. But while Alpha's hair
is blond, Beta's is silver.)

(Beta has blue feline eyes and a mole right under one
of them. She's the third member of the Shadow Garden,
after me and Alpha.)

(I know I told Alpha to do things in moderation, but
I swear, she keeps taking people in like they're
stray cats or something.)
Where's Alpha?
She's searching for signs of Miss Claire.
Dang, she's fast. Is my sister alive?
Most likely.
Can we rescue her?

It's possible...but it requires your assistance,
Master Shadow.
Did Alpha say that?

Yes. She said we must take every precaution in a
hostage situation.

(If I'm being honest, Alpha is plenty powerful on her
own. If she's asking for backup, we must be dealing
with a big shot.)

(As of late, I haven't run out of training partners
with Alpha, Beta, and Delta around, but I do like
switching things up every once in a while.)

(And I'm obsessed with playing the part of a
mastermind, which makes this a perfect
opportunity.)

It's been a while since I've showed my true
strength...

(At this point, I'm used to giving off a mysterious
vibe. And with Alpha and Beta creating the
optimal environment for pretend play, I've
been pretty hyped up lately.)

(She takes out a pile of documents and starts
 saying all kinds of cryptic things. Like "Your
story was true after all..." and "The Children
of Diablos from one thousand years ago...")

(And "This monument may be a sign of the
Cult...," but I don't know for sure, 'cause I
can't read ancient texts.)

(I have a feeling that Alpha can't even understand
them.)

(I bet the two of them scrounged up some paperwork
that looked appropriately suspicious to feel as if
we're getting closer to the truth. Yeah, that
sounds about right.)

As we'd expected, the perpetrator is a member of the
Cult of Diablosâ€”presumably one of their highest-
ranking officers.
What do they want with my sister?

They must suspect that she's one of the heroes'
descendants.

(I see... The girls have wasted no time recasting the
bandit as a member of the Cult.)

Take a look at this. We tracked the members down to
this hideout. However, we still haven't determined if
this is where they're keeping Miss Claire...

(Beta begins laying out a huge heap of files. It's
complete gibberish to me.)

(The majority is written in ancient alphabet, and the
others are nonsensical numbers and symbols. Dang,
they really have a knack for creating fake reports.
In this regard, they're way better than me.)
There.

I ignore her explanation and chuck a small knife
at the map on the wall.
(Oops! My hand slipped.)
That's where my sister is.
What...?! B-But...there's nothing...

(Erm, ah, it's really just a random throw. But Beta
is a great actress.)

(Lemme take a guess. She's gonna say the secret
hideout is located right at the tip of the knife,
right?)
*gasp*

No way... Is this cipher a diversion?! If so, can I
connect everything by cross-referencing this
with my reports?
(See? What did I say?)

It appears the hideout is at the location you
identified, Master Shadow.

To think you instantly interpreted these documents
and uncovered hidden details... You never cease to
amaze me.

(What a performance, Beta. Someone hand her an Oscar
already.)
Tell the Seven Shadows...
We attempt our rescue tonight.
Understood!
//ãƒ ãƒ¼ãƒ“ãƒ¼å†ç”Ÿï¼ˆãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¿ç²å¾—ï¼‰

Once we pass through here, we'll arrive at the
location Master Shadow identified.

It seems to be an ordinary forest. I'm surprised you
noticed that there was a hidden hideout here.
I've had my suspicions for some time now.

That's incredible, Master Shadow! All this time,
you'd already uncovered the Cult's plans and
figured out the location of their hideout!

In other words, you were playing cat and mouse with
them. You could've at least told us.

I exercised caution to consider all possibilities,
maintain flexibility, and wait for the opportune
moment.
How sensible...!
I didn't realize you were thinking so far ahead.
Y-Yup.

(Oh boy. Things are gonna get outta hand if the
bandits aren't here...)
I'm...gonna go pick flowers.
What a profound expression.
Pick flowers? What do you mean?
No, Beta. You mustn't follow him.

But, even if it's Master Shadow, going off alone near
an enemy hideout is...

Don't worry. There must be something he has to do
on his own.

If only there were some bandits around here...
I'd settle for demons or even some ominous-
looking caves. Beggars can't be choosers.

I should be able to find something if I use my
special magic detection.
Seriously? There aren't even demons aroundâ€”huh?
Wonder what that could be. Ruins, maybe?
...I'm being watched. I sense them beneath me.

Shadow swings his slime sword into the ground, and
several Cult members leap out of the earth.
I'm surprised you found us.

Hiding under the sand, huh? I can see the romantic
appeal, but who the hell are you guys?

I'm just a lookout. I would've let you go if you'd
walked past without noticing anything.

Sounds like you wanna fight. Perfect. Thanks to you,
I get to advance to the next event.
The hell are you talking about...?
Shadow, what was that soundâ€”?!
Master Shadow! Who is that man?!
Tsk. So, you've brought friends.
Hehehe. You're late, Alpha, Beta.

Just as I thoughtâ€”you used the pretense of picking
flowers to go searching for clues.

Incredible, Master Shadow! Then, this man here, he's
part of the Cult...?
That's right. He belongs to the Cult of Diablos!
Whaâ€”?!
